original_title: Piaキャロットへようこそ!! 劇場版 ~さやかの恋物語~
overview: Yusuke Kinoshita is forced by his father to work at his restaurant Pia Carrot all summer due to his bad grades in school. What first seems to be a boring job becomes a memorable experience due to his interactions with his co-workers and his boss.
title: Welcome to Pia Carrot!! The Movie: Sayaka's Love Story
